data.prayer: Father, help your children in San Germán, Puerto Rico find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Germán, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of San Germán.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of San Germán, Puerto Rico need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 9,851 believers in the state of San Germán to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of San Germán to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in San Germán, Puerto Rico so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 9,851 believers in San Germán to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary:
the state of San Germán, Puerto Rico has a population of 30,300.

We estimate San Germán has 9,851 people who might know Jesus, 18,796 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,652 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
